entries.name: Soulflame
entries: The cultist ignites with magical fire. For the next minute, they gain the following benefits:

items: They are immune to fire damage and the grappled condition.
Their melee attacks deal an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) fire damage.
Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the cultist takes 7 ({@dice 2d6}) fire damage.

entries: If the cultist dies or at the end of the duration, the cultist and any equipment they are carrying is consumed by the fire and reduced to ash.
